评论概述: Slightly too small for the specified size
评论详情: Of course, I don't know if this is always the case or just for me, but the 4XL from this manufacturer is clearly different from other manufacturers of the same size - especially if they come from the USA. The polo shirt is significantly shorter. Not so short that it's no longer possible, but short enough. Shoulders are not affected - just the length. And the material isn't that good either, it feels a bit like a flag. Certainly weather and color resistant - but rather sweaty on the skin. But it works with an undershirt - so it's more for cold days. All in all, it looks like the pictures, but I wouldn't buy it again. Not even if it gets longer - the material is too uncomfortable on the skin for me.
This shirt is for a smaller frame man it Doesn’t have a great stretch to I got it for my boyfriend for a event and it was just to snug get a size up the material as well is a thin material

I was a little disappointed in the pattern on this polo. I ordered it for my son who loves black and gold. It is obviously a picture of a print used. Not the quality it was displayed I don’t think. He’s wearing it but not as intended. The fit is great. It also was very late for his birthday. Got several mixed messages on its delivery and then it just showed up at my doorstep. Not sure what happened. Won’t order again from this vendor.

评论概述: This shirt has a great design and color that’s perfect for the summer.
评论详情: I was surprise to get comments from my family members on how good this shirt looks. This shirt also feel great on my body.

I love this short. It's an outlandish design, but that's what in style at the moment. I think it pairs well with white skater shorts or pants. It fits as expected and lays wall on the body. Recommended!

This shirt is even bolder in person. It is gold and black and the design is bold.  It is a silky material but it is not silk. It is soft and when it was washed the colors did not fade and it did not shrink. It is comfortable and fits great. If you want a bold shirt this is the shirt to get.

Love this shirt! Love the look, love the material and sizing is accurate!

After a good wash, the fabric relaxes a lot. Super comfortable and while the fit is casual the print adds a bit of fun and class to it. Awesome for work, where I wear predominantly business casual. Could be fun for night golf as it is a polo rather than a collared shirt. Almost has an activewear feel to the material without being clingy or having that tacky polyester feel.

评论概述: Its a LOUD shirt, but I dig it.
评论详情: I didn't realize how much of a statement this shirt made till I put it on. I'm 6' and about 260 lbs, so a bit of a bigger guy, but the 2XL fit me perfectly. I love the design and pattern and it was really comfy to wear. Great shirt to wear for a fun casual Friday type theme at work. Just about everyone who saw it made a comment one way or another about it. Which was kinda fun- Its always nice to have something in the wardrobe that makes a loud statement.  Hope this helps.
The shirt is a great fit, the fabric is soft and carefree. It is hard to see details in the ad, but the print is blue roses and gold chains. This shirt is great for dressing up or casual wear.

This shirt has a pretty cool design and actually looks as pictured. The quality is extremely thing, actually worried about washing and drying this thing. Also, it runs a little small, but pretty close to size, not too drastic. To be honest, this is priced at $25, the material and quality of a WalMart polo is better - and less expensive....So is it worth the price? I don't think so.
My husband loves the shirt. He says it looks like a Versace shirt. He is 6’0 tall and around about 210 pounds. He wears a xl but this is a L. Material is soft.

The pictures in this review doesn't even do this shirt justice. I love the texture and feel of the fabric. Vibrant colors and patterns that's certain to garner attention.  Provides the perfect slim fit look. Would definitely recommend it.
Material is medium weight and made well.  Colors are vibrant.  Shirt fits well but a little on the short side .

评论概述: The Shirt is Cool, but the Fabric is Problematic
评论详情: It's a nice shirt. It fits great, and it's comfortable. The designs are cool, and it's quite stylish.  The only problem is the shirt's material. I do not like the polyester for this style of shirt. It wears and feels like a jersey rather than the elegant shirt it portrays itself to be. But for the price, it is what it is.  I don't dislike the shirt as a whole; I just wish the fabric was better quality.
